sections.heading: Overview
content:
Anne E. Pearce has worked with Dean Ornish, MD, for the past five years. She
has developed online resources for his landmark program of comprehensive
changes in diet and lifestyle in order to help make it more widely available
through the Internet. These resources include online support groups, feature
articles and various guided audio and video meditation training tools. Her 10
years as an avid yoga practitioner and instructor have trained her in the
various stress management techniques integral to Dr. Ornish's program, such as
therapeutic stretching, meditation, guided imagery and breath awareness.
